creator: MSC Cruises S.A.
descriptionHtml:
The official MSC for Me app works alongside other digital channels onboard to ensure you have the information you need at your fingertips. Plus, the app is free and even on board you will not need to purchase any internet package in order to use it.

The MSC for Me app is available on all the smart ships in our fleet: MSC Meraviglia, MSC Seaside, MSC Splendida*, MSC Seaview, MSC Bellissima and MSC Grandiosa.

Pre-cruise features
Start organising your cruise experience even before boarding.

Do your check-in and register your credit card in advance.
Enjoy a smooth embarkation by checking in via the MSC for Me app and pair a credit card with your Cruise Card, so you’re ready to go as soon as you board.

Book now and take advantage of our pre-cruise rates.
Plan your fun time and book your favourite activities even before sailing*. Discover exciting shore excursions, entertaining events, specialty dining options and much more about the onboard experience.


Onboard features
Enjoy a relaxing and worry-free cruise experience.

Keep in contact with your friends and family with the MSC for Me chat.
Use the MSC for Me free chat to talk with your onboard mates.

Never miss what’s important and book your activities.
Search and reserve activities and then get notifications for your booked events, restaurants, shore excursions, shopping and all the significant information, directly on your smartphone.

Explore the cruise with the interactive ship map.
Get real time directions to your cabin, find your way around quickly and easily and discover restaurants, or other points of interest onboard.

Enjoy a carefree holiday time with the Family & Friends Locator.
Locate your kids or meet your friends anywhere on the cruise (service upon a fee).

Purchase Internet packages
Choose the internet package that best fits your needs and manage Internet consumption directly from the Msc for Me app.

Choose your speciality restaurant and drink packages.
Book your favorite speciality restaurant and drink packages, fascinating events, special dining options, and much more.

Keep track of your onboard expenses and transactions.
Pair a credit card and associate Guests with your booking number to your billing account in order to manage your Cruise Card transactions directly in-app.

We are constantly working for adding new features and making the app available on more ships. Please take a minute to give your feedback on the MSC for Me app to help us improve it.

*Please note: the MSC for Me app functionality may vary from ship to ship and across different markets. The app works on MSC Splendida only when the cruise is from China.
descriptionShort: Get the most out of your cruise with the MSC for Me app!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Starting with the launch of MSC Grandiosa and progressively on all other ‘smart’ ships, the MSC for Me app now offers:
- Scanning of your identity card (or passport) and completing registration and check-in
- Booking of speciality restaurants and beverage packages
- Booking of onboard services now even easier
- Check the ship’s real time position while sailing
- Chinese/Japanese language availability (only for Japanese and Chinese Cruises)
- Seamless digital experience through QR code

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: The app is now more reliable. This update contains bug fixes and improvements.

title: MSC for Me

creator: MSC Cruises S.A.
descriptionHtml:
The official MSC for Me app works alongside other digital channels onboard to ensure you have the information you need at your fingertips. Plus, the app is free and even on board you will not need to purchase any internet package in order to use it.

The MSC for Me app is available on all the smart ships* in our fleet: MSC Bellissima, MSC Grandiosa, MSC Magnifica, MSC Meraviglia, MSC Seashore, MSC Seaside, MSC Seaview, MSC Splendida and MSC Virtuosa.
Coming soon on MSC Seascape and MSC World Europa

Pre-cruise features
Start organising your cruise experience even before boarding.

Do your check-in and register your credit card in advance.
Enjoy a smooth embarkation by checking in via the MSC for Me app and pair a credit card with your Cruise Card, so you’re ready to go as soon as you board.

Book now and take advantage of our pre-cruise rates.
Plan your fun time and book your favourite activities even before sailing*. Discover exciting shore excursions, entertaining events, specialty dining options and much more about the onboard experience.


Onboard features
Enjoy a relaxing and worry-free cruise experience.

Keep in contact with your friends and family with the MSC for Me chat.
Use the MSC for Me free chat to talk with your onboard mates.

Never miss what’s important and book your activities.
Search and reserve activities and then get notifications for your booked events, restaurants, shore excursions, shopping and all the significant information, directly on your smartphone.

Purchase Internet packages
Choose the internet package that best fits your needs and manage Internet consumption directly from the MSC for Me app.

Choose your speciality restaurant and drink packages.
Book your favorite speciality restaurant and drink packages, fascinating events, special dining options, and much more.

Keep track of your onboard expenses and transactions.
Pair a credit card and associate Guests with your booking number to your billing account in order to manage your Cruise Card transactions directly in-app.

We are constantly working on adding new features and making the app available on more ships. Please take a minute to give your feedback on the MSC for Me app to help us improve it.

*Please note: the MSC for Me app functionality may vary from ship to ship and across different markets.

Plan your fun time and book your favourite activities even before sailing*. Discover exciting shore excursions, entertaining events, specialty dining options and much more about the onboard experience.

The official MSC for Me app works alongside other digital channels onboard to ensure you have the information you need at your fingertips. Plus, the app is free and even on board you will not need to purchase any internet package in order to use it.

Available for guests travelling on all ships except for MSC Armonia, MSC Lirica, MSC Sinfonia, MSC Opera and MSC Orchestra.Coming soon on MSC World America.

Pre-cruise features
Start organising your cruise experience even before boarding.

Do your check-in and register your credit card in advance.
Enjoy a smooth embarkation by checking in via the MSC for Me app and pair a credit card with your Cruise Card, so you’re ready to go as soon as you board.

Book now and take advantage of our pre-cruise rates.
Plan your fun time and book your favourite activities even before sailing*. Discover exciting shore excursions, entertaining events, specialty dining options and much more about the onboard experience.


Onboard features
Enjoy a relaxing and worry-free cruise experience.

Keep in contact with your friends and family with the MSC for Me chat.
Use the MSC for Me free chat to talk with your onboard mates.

Never miss what’s important and book your activities.
Search and reserve activities and then get notifications for your booked events, restaurants, shore excursions, shopping and all the significant information, directly on your smartphone.

Purchase Internet packages
Choose the internet package that best fits your needs and manage Internet consumption directly from the MSC for Me app.

Choose your speciality restaurant and drink packages.
Book your favorite speciality restaurant and drink packages, fascinating events, special dining options, and much more.

Keep track of your onboard expenses and transactions.
Pair a credit card and associate Guests with your booking number to your billing account in order to manage your Cruise Card transactions directly in-app.

We are constantly working on adding new features and making the app available on more ships. Please take a minute to give your feedback on the MSC for Me app to help us improve it.

*Please note: the MSC for Me app functionality may vary from ship to ship and across different markets.
descriptionShort: Get the most out of your cruise with the MSC for Me app!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Download the cruise boarding pass
Take the required ships security photo prior to embarkation
Choose arrival time slot to the terminal for embarkation day
Manage your bookings with a single MSC account
